events.title: HMS2 Roundtable
events.notes:
Key Issues: Severe communication delays - questions unanswered 6-8 hrs, multi-day gaps despite 60-80 people in Kooner chat. Steven: Never experienced such delay vs prior vendors.

Safety/Compliance Failures: Truck 21 passed Federal DOT but failed MN inspection with visible drag link issues. Truck 20 had 5 federal DOT failures caught by external shop. Wrong stickers on wrong vehicles.

Work Quality: Truck 1 urgent WO at 8am, tech sat idle until 12:15pm. WOs marked complete when repairs not finished. Multiple recreations needed.

Root Causes: Coverage gaps across shifts, tech (Michael) attendance/training issues, no escalation protocols, DSPs unclear on contacts.

Solutions Discussed: David (experienced manager tech) deploying next week for training/oversight. Formal dispatch schedule being created. This is 2nd escalation - relationship at risk.

actionItems.action: Provide direct numbers for 24/7 contact
Send dispatch schedule with roles/coverage times
Visit HMS2 next week for training & process review
Document VINs, dates, WO details via email + chat
Schedule site visit after David training complete
Establish escalation protocols for urgent repairs

events.title: HCL2 Roundtable
events.notes:
Key Issues: D4DS (Andrea) down to 6 of 17 trucks. Multiple vehicles grounded due to incomplete PMs - one sitting since Jan 22. Communication breakdown: no responses since Saturday, messages unanswered for days. Unexpected tech departure caused service disruption.

Root Causes: No proactive status updates, parts availability delays, badge access issues, two intake systems creating confusion, no real-time WO visibility for DSPs.

Solutions Discussed: Justin Ellis relocating permanently (6pm-2am shift), Eugene deploying to help clear backlog. Relay Garage integration planned for mid-March with Fleet Portal scheduling.

actionItems.action: Provide cell numbers for direct contact
Daily AM updates in Chime on overnight completions
Send contact list with roles
Provide ETA doc for all 28 open WOs
Meet Justin to set up vehicle shuttle system
Set up key box at FC entrance
Share D4 WOs in Chime for reconciliation

events.title: HPD1 Roundtable
events.notes:
Key Context: Unique site - only DSP at location, co-located with FC, 20-30 min from other Amazon facilities. Robert (DSP) has existing vendor relationship (1.5 yrs) with dedicated 1-2 techs who know his fleet.

Service Gaps Identified: No proactive PM scheduling communication. No notification when repairs completed. Inconsistent tech coverage. Kooner removed dedicated Vancouver travel tech due to volume decrease. BOX invoice process implemented without DSP awareness.

Impact: Ryan: Biggest concern is fleet constraints from maintenance causing dropped routes.

Solutions Discussed: Tech integration within 1 month for comms. Amazon Fleet Portal integration end of March/April. Dedicated tech Michael available (5-10 min from site). Moving from Chime to Slack.

actionItems.action: Schedule follow-up meeting Fri or Mon/Tue same time
Send meeting invite to attendees with forwarding option
Document specific communication expectations
Align on service level requirements
Introduce dedicated technician Michael
Establish escalation procedures

events.title: HDY1 Roundtable
events.notes:
Communication & Process Issues: New tech Charles transitioned from middle mile without proper last mile training. Missing badge access. No direct communication established with DSP fleet managers. Previous tech Tim left suddenly, creating rushed transition.

Service Quality & Documentation Problems: Invoice delays impacting truck availability. PMs completed overnight but invoices not uploaded to Box until 4pm next day. DOT inspection quality issue at TLG. Weather delays affecting timely service.

Daily Operations & Scheduling: Charles currently works Mon-Fri 8am-5pm. May need later hours for vehicles returning from routes. New daily reporting system starting.

actionItems.action: Get Charles badge access, follow up with station today
Share Charles contact info with DSP fleet managers
Continue daily schedule updates in Chime
Review DOT inspection training with Charles
Send escalation path contacts by EOD
Formalize SOP document
Audit daily schedules, prioritize WOs, tag team in Chime
Provide FIM details for DOT inspection incident
